text: illeogalodoe haneulgwa daejieseonuga neohuiege il-yonghal yangsig-eul ju neunyo ttohan deudgehago bogehasim-eun nugu-inyo jug-eunjaleul salge hanjaneun nugu-inyo nuga sanjaleul jugge haneu nyo nuga ildeul-eul jugwanhaneunyo hana nim-iyo lago hanila geuttae ileudoe geuleomyeon neohuiga wae geubun-eul dulyeowo haji anhneunyo
